THAR SHE BLOWS!

Aug 28, 2006

Man this thing took forever to refinish, but sure enough Jenn and I got it done before the baby and before the move. Please check out the lovely before and after photos. Hope this little jewel lives up to the hype Jenn and I have been giving it…and if not well just don’t leave a comment how ’bout that! I’m out!
